department.ch: 水文與海洋科學研究所碩士班
department.en: MSc in Hydrologocal and  Oceanic Sciences

goal.ch: 目的在使學生能夠認識環境紊流的物理特性。本課程由基礎紊流理論開始講授，希望由此建立學生的紊流背景知識，進而可以延伸並認識環境紊流的動力機制。修課之學生將可以瞭解環境紊流的物理動力特性，及如何分析、量化、及模式化地描述環境紊流。
goal.en: "This course is designed for graduate students who pursue advanced knowledge on fluid dynamics of turbulent flows.  Throughout the course, the students will increase their understanding on the turbulence, its dynamics and how to analyze, quantify and closure it.  Special emphasis on the environmental turbulence will be addressed in the course."

outline.ch: "General introduction, Review of fluid mechanics & Introduction of turbulence, Basics of turbulent flow, Dynamics of turbulence, Turbulence modeling and closure,  Statistical description of turbulent flows, Scales of turbulence, Spectra of turbulence, Coherent structure in turbulent flows, Boundary-free shear flow, Wall-bounded shear flow, Nearshore turbulence, Turbulence in oceanic boundary layers, Turbulent flow measurement and analysis, Discussions"
outline.en: "General introduction, Review of fluid mechanics & Introduction of turbulence, Basics of turbulent flow, Dynamics of turbulence, Turbulence modeling and closure,  Statistical description of turbulent flows, Scales of turbulence, Spectra of turbulence, Coherent structure in turbulent flows, Boundary-free shear flow, Wall-bounded shear flow, Nearshore turbulence, Turbulence in oceanic boundary layers, Turbulent flow measurement and analysis, Discussions"
